job_description: Provides programs to improve operational efficiency, consistency, and compliance in support of the organization*s financial and tactical business objectives. Provides business practices and processes. Develops, communicates, and trains the organization on business practices and processes. Serve as a liaison with other divisions such as Finance, Contracts, HR, Legal, Shared Services, Accounts Receivable, Purchasing, and Risk Management in an effort to ensure accurate and timely transaction processing. Provides administrative support to the Business Analysts to collect, input, verify, correct, and analyze data to measure key performance indicator actual versus business objectives. Prepares updates to management received from the Business Analysts regarding budget to actual, informing them of deviations and opportunities. Provide management with economic impact and compliance issues surrounding key business decisions and/or deals. Assists in the communication of Oracle Business Practices to the organization and monitor process and approvals for full compliance. May assist in driving implementation of new processes and procedures. Works on assignments that are routine in nature where limited judgment is needed. May determine methods and procedures on new assignments. May provide guidance to other support members. Applies technical aspects of the job to complete tasks. Typically 4 - 6 years of related experience., The GSCO (Global Sales and Consulting Operations) central team is responsible for providing training, business, contract support and communications on the Sales Systems and Tools used by Sales and Consulting globally. The focus of this role will be to support Oracle s Sales Organization via chat and incident support using Oracle s Service Cloud product. The GSCO Business Analyst will report to the GSCO Team Lead and will be responsible for providing high quality, responsive support to Oracle s Global Sales and Consulting teams. Professional-level English written and verbal skills and a commitment to high quality customer service are essential. Job duties are varied and complex, needing independent judgment and include but are not limited to: Responsibilities: Provide chat, email support to resolve user problems with proactive troubleshooting Follow predefined (as trained) support procedures and policies Master the use of our support channels, processes & tools Identify and report Partner/user issues & feedback through appropriate channels. Proactively identify opportunities to optimize and develop processes & tools geared toward improving internal efficiency, resolution rate and customer satisfaction. Effectively and judiciously escalate issues with clear communication Support team lead/ manager when required CSAT/resolution rate initiatives Ability and willingness to quickly complete large volumes of work with high quality Work and communicate with cross-functional teams (engineering, sales, product specialists, etc) using various channels of internal Escalate support requests to management and ensure they receive the appropriate attention Ensure Service Level Agreements (SLAs) and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) are met Work across other lines of businesses and third parties e.g. business practices, legal Provide timely resolution of customer complaints and escalations including providing corrective actions Undertake admin responsibilities as required Support new process/policy roll-outs Undertake other projects as required Skills: Graduate in any discipline Must have experience in sales support handling Chats & emails. Should have strong knowledge in one of the following tools (OSC, WQ, CPQ, GSI, DAS, QRS) and Process (Cloud, UCM). Excellent written communication skills in English for email and chat support channels Strong analytical, problem solving, troubleshooting skills & Interpersonal skills Attention to detail with the ability to complete a large volume of work quickly and independently Ability to work collaboratively in a diverse team environment. Proactive approach (ability to identify top support areas, innovate and suggest process improvements) Open to work in 24*7 environment including holidays Good keyboarding skills, PC skills, esp. in Word/Excel Team player with very good interpersonal skills and forward-looking attitude Open to ideas/feedback Ability to interpret, clearly articulate and advise sales on potential objections to Oracle s policies and commercial terms Ability to proactively analyze and recommend best course of action for complex contract scenario s within a sales cycle Ability to deal with challenging support requests in a timely manner Ability and desire to provide excellent customer-service to internal customers Ability to work independently and in a dynamic environment Positive and Can Do Attitude Results orientated Note: Please apply only if you are willing to work in Night Shifts and Weekends

Bangalore, India Understand user expectations and develop functional requirements and raises clarifications with stakeholders. Give Knowledge Transfer to the development team on Functional Specifications. Train developers on functional concepts and resolve functional problems faced. Acts as SPOC for business requirements and represents the end user in the development team. Lead and conduct functional testing thereby responsible for certification of product release before user acceptance. Encourage best practices and apply them in the team - responsible for functional product quality. Understand Agile practices (daily scrum, iteration planning, retrospective, test driven, model storming) and follow the same. Set priority on work product as per the agreed iteration goals. Work effectively with other team members by sharing best practices.

html_job_description:
BA, Technical Architecture
Technical Architect- To design the structure of IT systems and oversee programs to ensure the accurate architecture is implemented
In this role, one should be an excellent communicator who is able to translate complex requirements into functional architecture. To have hands-on experience on software development and be able to manage complex programs.
Goal will be to ensure internal IT framework operates properly
Understand company needs to define system specifications
Plan and design the structure of a technology solution
Communicate system requirements to software development teams
Evaluate and select appropriate software or hardware and suggest integration methods
Lead all aspects of assigned programs (e.g. conduct code review) and provide guidance to team members
Assist with solving technical problems when they arise
Ensure the implementation of agreed architecture and infrastructure
Address technical concerns, ideas and suggestions
Monitor systems to ensure they meet both user needs and business goals
Qualifications we seek in you!
Minimum qualifications
BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field
Proven experience as a Technical Architect or as project manager
Hands-on experience with software development and system administration
Understanding of strategic IT solutions
Experience in project management and service-oriented architecture (SOA)
Knowledge of selected coding languages (e.g. JavaScript, Java)
Familiarity with various operating systems (e.g. Windows, UNIX) and databases (e.g. MySQL)
Experience in cloud technologies (e.g. VMware)
Preferred qualifications
Excellent interpersonal skills
Problem-solving aptitude
Organizational and leadership skills,

html_job_description:
Collateral Management Business Analyst
5 years of Business Analysis experience
Position Purpose
The Collateral Management IT department comprises of project managers, BA s and developers who are assigned specific projects. Predominately the team is located in Mumbai but has part of its BA, development team in London and NY.
The candidate will join the Collateral Management IT team working as a Business Analyst
BA requirement is within Collateral IT Domain. Collateral Domain is structured with following main streams of development, initiated project can be managed by any of the below listed stream
1. Third party Collateral Management System
2. Clearing Stream
3. Bilateral phased maintenance team
4. Regulatory stream

The successful candidate will be expected to significantly contribute to the overall success of the project initiated under the project stream
Responsibilities

Direct Responsibilities

1. Initial Analysis
a) Feasibility Studies
b) Initial estimations
c) Providing proposals, High level Solutions
d) Working with project managers to identify target delivery dates
2. Implementation/Post Live Support
a) Provide support for new/changed functionality where required
b) Producing release notes, user guides/documentation, arranging functional Demo s/Trainings

3. Testing
a) Produce and execute Functional Test Packs or provide guidance where required to testing team.
b) Regression Test Pack assessment
c) Organize and manage end user testing where required.
d) Escalation of environment issues preventing progress.
4. Functional Design and Documentation
a) Obtaining/clarifying/elaborating business requirements.
b) Functional solution design and documentation
c) Re-estimation throughout project lifecycle when required.

5. Provide 3 rd level support in line with defined Group processes.


Technical & Behavioral Competencies
Business knowledge:
A strong appreciation of Middle/Back Office functions

Trade lifecycle
Product knowledge: Interest rates derivatives, Credit Derivatives, Options, Fx options (Knowledge is required more in how these products might be represented in a Front Office, Back office system)

An appreciation of
Credit Risk framework
Collateral Management framework
Static data on Securities
Market data & prices
P/L
Accounting
Regulatory initiatives such as Dodd Frank, EMIR, Clearing

Required Business Analysis skills in IT system design
IT system design and testing: Interfaces between systems (FO feeding Back offices, Back offices feeding settlement and Collateral systems, Collateral systems feeding external systems such as Trioptima, Acadiasoft, Clearing houses )
Good understanding of data flowing between systems throughout the trade life cycle

Essential technical skills:
Experience with understanding complex systems, analyzing and resolving issues and writing functional and technical specifications, and test plans.
Experience in co-ordinating a dispersed set of stakeholders (functionally and geographically)
Experience with having organized and conducted all types of testing in a Banking environment.
Experience with structured project methodology.
Understanding of business analysis and systems analysis
Experience in drafting test plans, test scenario and test cases
Experience in executing functional testing
Knowledge of analysis methodologies like entity-relation modelling, use cases, process / transformation analysis
Be able to demonstrate an understanding of how business processes have been implemented and how data flows through those processes.
Ability to be able to represent a data flow and system process into a Visio diagram for presentation purposes to stakeholders
Ability to work with technology to assist with analysis eg SQL
A good knowledge of Excel, MS word, Visio, PowerPoint is required.

Essential personality skills:
Good interpersonal and communications skills to work effectively with representatives of a diverse range of departments located in various sites and locations (Collateral Management Operations, IT, Credit Risk, Market Risk) and within various business lines (mainly Fixed Income, Equity Derivatives).
Must be able to demonstrate can communicate well in writing and orally and manage relationships.
Being able to work under pressure, in a challenging environment, and to deal with confrontational situations.
Able to negotiate, to convince and find consensus.
Pro-active in rearranging priorities and solving issues where requested.
Being prepared to work long hours when necessary.
Has to be hands on, rigorous and methodical.
Skills Referential
BehaviouralSkills:
Ability to deliver / Results driven
Decision Making
Client focused
Communication skills - oral & written
Transversal Skills:
Analytical Ability
Ability to understand, explain and support change
Ability to develop and adapt a process
Ability to manage / facilitate a meeting, seminar, committee, training
Ability to develop and leverage networks
At least 5 years

,

html_job_description:
SmartStream s Fees and Expense Management (FEMS) business seeks a Sr. Business Analyst with capital markets experience and a proven track record of execution working on enterprise technology initiatives. Assignments will support IT, Operations and Continuous Improvement development activities. Job Responsibilities CHARACTERISTIC DUTIES AND ESSENTIAL RESPONSIBILITIES: 
Successful applicants will have experience working with internal and external clients, collecting and organizing data, have the ability to define collection methodology, templates, and tools, and be skilled at defining and prioritizing work in an efficient manner. Key areas of responsibilities: 
Requirements Management 
Elicit, record and analyze requirements to enable traceability to a desired customer outcome 
Document dependencies and interrelationships among requirements, as well as any assumptions 
Use advance techniques to capture existing, new, and unknown requirements (e.g., brainstorming, process workflow diagrams, qualitative and quantitative analysis, reverse engineering) 
Use tools that promote better understanding of the desired end- product such as visual aids, prototyping, and modeling tools 
Stakeholder Management and Client Engagement 
Directly engage functional owners and other stakeholders professionally, without supervision, and with appropriate messaging 
Complete business case and impact analysis on implementing new changes 
Document and clearly articulate the 'as is', 'to be' and transitional states for impacted users and delivery teams 
Validate with stakeholders to confirm accuracy and completeness 
Liaise between business units, technology teams and support teams to ensure the solution delivered meets all business needs and to avoid rework 
Provide client engagement support to customers on behalf of FEMS 
Solution Delivery 
Identify needs and evaluate alternative business solutions 
Contribute to the definition, design and delivery of solutions in accordance with specified scope, requirements, quality standards and target delivery dates 
Complete full range of required project activities related to maintaining artifacts and documentation 
Engage and support FEMS internal improvement initiatives as assigned Key Skills - Experience in the analysis of both business processes and the design of technology based solutions. 
- Ability to understand, explain and present complex technical ideas to both technical and non- technical audiences at all levels in a persuasive and convincing manner. 
- Ability to conceptualize and think creatively. 
- Ability to adapt to changing priorities while managing multiple activities, and objectives. 
- Experience with Jira, business process modelling, Unified Modeling Language (UML), and UML artifacts 
- Highly competent in MS Office Suite, MS Visio, and UML modelling tools 
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills. 
- Demonstrated ability to work in a fast- paced, deadline driven environment. 
- Demonstrated excellence in a variety of competencies including teamwork/ collaboration, analytical thinking, communication and influencing skills, and technical expertise. 
- Ability to work with changing priorities and with multiple projects. 
- Ability to be precise and attentive to detail is essential. 
- Ability to work with minimal supervision. 
- Ability to work weekend and off- hour work on occasion. Desirable Skills - Knowledge BC&E (Brokerage, Clearing, and Exchange) expense categories, global securities market structure, and accounting 
IIBA certification of ECBA; CCBA or CBAP preferred,

job_description: <b> We're looking for a highly strategic, detail-oriented business analyst to partner with our sales, marketing, product and leadership team; empowering them to optimize functional performance and provide insights. They should be able to translate various forms of data into compelling insights and visualizations; and have proven experience in executing strong analysis for business team. This person will be equal parts proficient data scientist and analyst, articulate communicator/visualizer and conceptual thinker.</b>     <p> <b> Responsibilities:</b> </p>   <p>  Ability to complete detailed analysis, identify/communicate the findings into high-level recommendations</p>   <p>  Lead data-gathering and analysis efforts for the same; leveraging a variety of analysis tools, always looking to extract actionable insights</p>   <p>  Translate business objectives and business problems into structured data-collection methodologies and ROI-driven findings.</p>   <p>  Work with cross-functional and cross-geographic teams to build insights, dashboards and interactive experiences to communicate large amounts of information to various business stakeholders</p>   <p>  Reporting and analysis of key business performance measures</p>   <p>  Deep diving in our product database to generate meaningful insights around our customers</p> <p><b>Required Candidate profile</b></p>                     <p>4+ years of experience with large data sets and marketing data analysis</p>  <p> Experience with databases; for both querying and scripting (preferably MongoDB and PostgreSQL)</p>  <p> Ability to utilize data from Google Analytics, Shopify, Facebook, Amazon, email marketing (MailChimp), other social media and other online marketing data sources to gather data and analyze marketing campaign performance</p>  <p> Experience in data mining and predictive modeling methodologies</p>  <p> Experience with reporting platforms like Tableau; and advanced proficiency in Excel (Modeling, pivot tables, advanced formulas)</p>  <p> Curious, fast learner, fast to respond, fearless attitude.</p>  <p> Comfort with ambiguity and the non-predictable pace of a start up</p>  <p> A passion for our product space</p>  <p> Self-motivated, energetic, "can-do" attitude in a fast-moving environment</p>  <p> Being able to thrive under pressure and balance perfection and time to "market" without sacrificing work/data quality.</p>   Plan and organize work to meet schedules and deadlines

The Business Analyst works out of the Mumbai Office as part of the analytics team to help Greenlight Planet's business units make data driven decisions.The Business Analyst has experience in data cleaning,  data transformation and metrics optimization. This person will report to the Global Analytics Leader.<br><br>Key responsibilities for the role: <br><br>Business Analysis: Understand business questions and hypotheses,  determine output metrics to answer them,  transform raw data to final output metrics and present the findings to business stakeholders through the company's business intelligence platform.<br><br>Data management: Oversee deployment of data to Data Warehouse (Amazon Redshift) and building efficient data pipelines to serve companywide reporting.<br><br>Reporting: Assist in identifying and delivering on new reporting capabilities. Take reporting asks from idea to implementation. Communicate complex metrics in a visually intuitive manner to business users. For Example: Sales trend analysis (analysing trends across channel,  product mix,  geography,  sales rep,  customer segments),  marketing mix optimization,  sales effectiveness,  churn analysis,  sales response modelling,  incentive compensation modelling,  customer segmentation.<br><br>The ideal Candidate: <br><br>Analytics experience: 3 -  4 years<br><br>Proficient use of SQL for extraction and manipulation of data.<br><br>Advanced excel skills for answering business questions quickly.<br><br>Experience in statistical modelling in one or more data analysis language -  R,  SAS,  SPSS or python (preferred).<br><br>Experience of Looker/ Qlikview/ Tableau will be a plus.<br><br>Experience in conducting most of the following types of analysis.<br><br>

Job Description:
Essential Job Functions

  • Assists in planning and designing business processes; assists in formulating recommendations to improve and support business activities.
  • Assists in analyzing and documenting client''s business requirements and processes; communicates these requirements to technical personnel by constructing basic conceptual data and process models, including data dictionaries and volume estimates.
  • Assists in creating basic test scenarios to be used in testing the business applications in order to verify that client requirements are incorporated into the system design.
  • Assists in developing and modifying systems requirements documentation to meet client needs.
  • Participates in meetings with clients to gather and document requirements and explore potential solutions.
  • Executes systems tests from existing test plans. Assists in analyzing test results in various phases.
  • Participates in technical reviews and inspections to verify ''intent of change'' is carried through phase of project.
Basic Qualifications
  • Bachelor''s degree or equivalent combination of education and experience
  • Bachelor''s degree in business administration, information systems, or related field preferred
  • Three or more years of business analysis experience
  • Experience working with the interface of information technology with functional groups within an organization
  • Experience working with business processes and re-engineering
  • Experience working with computer programming concepts and basic language
Other Qualifications
  • Interpersonal skills to interact with customers and team members
  • Communication skills
  • Analytical and problem solving skills
  • Presentation skills to communicate with management and customers
  • Personal computer and business solutions software skills
  • Ability to work in a team environment with multiple team members and the ability to multitask
  • Willingness to travel
Work Environment
  • Office environment

Job Description

JOB DESCRIPTION
 · To explore, assess and review the client’s management information requirements with the client before defining them to an IT project team.
· Ensure standard processes and procedures are followed in accordance with IT Governance standards.
· Capture identified risks or issues so the relevant project manager can enter them in the appropriate registers.
· Provide advice and guidance on functional interdependencies identified during requirements analysis and how that may influence or constrain project scheduling.
· Provide Non Functional Requirements relating to user security, access control, user profiles and audit.
· Review and approve the requirements, systems design and other business analysis documentation produced by the supplier to ensure that the solution meets business requirements and satisfies Aon standards.
· Technical Problem Solving - To provide subject matter expert advice and assistance to project teams in the resolution of technical problems.
· Technical Support - Provide subject matter input in the resolution of general technical production incidents to achieve timely resolution.
Education
· Bachelor/Master’s Degree in Engineering or Computer Applications- BE/B.Tech/ BCA/ Bsc (IT)/ Msc (IT)
· Computer application certifications, as applicable.

A company recognized globally for its comprehensive portfolio of services, strong commitment to sustainability and good corporate citizenship, we have over 160,000 dedicated employees serving clients across six continents.

<p> <i> </i> </p>     <p> <b> JOB DESCRIPTION</b> <b> </b> </p>     <p> <b> JOB TITLE: </b> <b> Senior Business Analyst</b> <i> </i> </p>     <p> <b> JOBTYPE: </b> <b> Full time</b> <i> </i> </p>     <p> <b> LOCATION: </b> <b> Chennai,  Tamilnadu</b> <b> </b> </p>     <p> <b> </b> </p>     <p> <b> SUPERVISOR/MANAGER: </b> Business Analyst Manager<i> </i> </p>     <p> <b> PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES</b> <br>   Responsible for handling client projects, develop and  implement business process for Managed care with specific focus in Claims  EDI Implementation and processing with HIPAA Compliance.</p>     <p> <b> Client Delivery</b> <b> </b> </p>     <ul> <li>   Organize  and execute assigned business projects based on client's requirements</li> <li>   Work  closely with business owners and stakeholders to create and enhance business  process</li> <li>   Formulate  recommendations and solutions to meet client needs and enhance efficiency</li> <li>   Requirement  Gathering and Analysis</li> <li>   Preparation  of requirement documentation including BRD, FRS, User Stories</li> <li>   Lead Functional  Requirement workshops/ walkthroughs with stakeholders on project progress </li> <li>   Handle  Change Management</li> <li>   Implementation  review and Functional Testing</li> <li>   Assist  in UAT</li> <li>   Work  with cross functional teams to perform gap analysis and identify improvement  options.</li> <li>   Participate  in the business development process by assisting in the development of project  approaches and proposals</li> <li>   Perform  Business Process Improvement using various business consulting tools and  methodologies</li> </ul>                                                 <p> <b> <i> Domain Expertise</i> </b> </p>     <ul> <li>   Expertise  in Electronic Health Record/ Electronic Medical Record systems</li> <li>   Expertise  in Workers' Compensation system - Chennai, India The IT Business Senior Analyst is an intermediate-level position responsible for liaising between business users and technologists to exchange information in a concise, logical and understandable way in coordination with the Technology team. The overall objective of this role is to contribute to continuous iterative exploration and investigation of business performance and other measures to gain insight and drive business planning. Responsibilities: Formulate and define systems scope and objectives for complex projects and foster communication between business leaders and IT Consult with users and clients to solve complex system issues/problems through in-depth evaluation of business processes, systems and industry standards and recommends solutions Support system change processes from requirements through implementation and provide input based on analysis of information Consult with business clients to determine system functional specifications and provides user and operational support Identify and communicate risks and impacts, considering business implications of the application of technology to the current business environment Act as advisor or coach to new or lower level analysts and work as a team to achieve business objectives, performing other duties and functions as assigned Appropriately assess risk when business decisions are made, demonstrating particular consideration for the firm's reputation and safeguarding Citigroup, its clients and assets, by driving compliance with applicable laws, rules and regulations, adhering to Policy, applying sound ethical judgment regarding personal behavior, conduct and business practices, and escalating, managing and reporting control issues with transparency. Qualifications: 5-8 years of relevant experience Experience in data analysis with intermediate/advanced Microsoft Office Suite skills Proven interpersonal, data analysis, diplomatic, management and prioritization skills Consistently demonstrate clear and concise written and verbal communication Proven ability to manage multiple activities and build/develop working relationships Proven self-motivation to take initiative and master new tasks quickly Demonstrated ability to work under pressure to meet tight deadlines and approach work methodically with attention to detail Education: Bachelor's degree/University degree or equivalent experience ------------------------------------------------ Grade :All Job Level - All Job FunctionsAll Job Level - All Job Functions - IN ----------------------------------------------------- Time Type : ----------------------------------------------------- Citi is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. html_job_description:
Job Description:
Summary
Assists in the research and assessment of business goals, objectives and needs to align information technology solutions with business initiatives for multiple, less complex accounts. Serves as the liaison between technical personnel and business area for multiple accounts.Essential Job Functions

  • Assists in planning and designing business processes; assists in formulating recommendations to improve and support business activities.
  • Assists in analyzing and documenting client''s business requirements and processes; communicates these requirements to technical personnel by constructing basic conceptual data and process models, including data dictionaries and volume estimates.
  • Assists in creating basic test scenarios to be used in testing the business applications in order to verify that client requirements are incorporated into the system design.
  • Assists in developing and modifying systems requirements documentation to meet client needs.
  • Participates in meetings with clients to gather and document requirements and explore potential solutions.
  • Executes systems tests from existing test plans. Assists in analyzing test results in various phases.
  • Participates in technical reviews and inspections to verify ''intent of change'' is carried through phase of project.
Basic Qualifications
  • Bachelor''s degree or equivalent combination of education and experience
  • Bachelor''s degree in business administration, information systems, or related field preferred
  • Three or more years of business analysis experience
  • Experience working with the interface of information technology with functional groups within an organization
  • Experience working with business processes and re-engineering
  • Experience working with computer programming concepts and basic language
Other Qualifications
  • Interpersonal skills to interact with customers and team members
  • Communication skills
  • Analytical and problem solving skills
  • Presentation skills to communicate with management and customers
  • Personal computer and business solutions software skills
  • Ability to work in a team environment with multiple team members and the ability to multitask
  • Willingness to travel
Work Environment
  • Office environment

Job Description

Company: Global Investment Bank
 Experience: 5 - 7 Yrs
 Job Location: Bangalore
 Key Skills: Business Analyst with Banking Domain
 Must Have Skills: Business Analyst with Banking Domain
 INDUSTRY
Banking
 ROLE
Business Analyst - Banking
 QUALIFICATION
 Any UG / PG
 QUALIFICATION SPECIALIZATION
 Any UG / PG
 JOB LOCATION
 Bangalore
 INTERVIEW LOCATION
 Bangalore
JOB DESCRIPTION
Require 5-7 years related experience with strong fundamentals in Investment Banking and Capital Markets, Market Risk,FRTB, VaR , Risk Analysis
Working and good knowledge of SQL / RDBMS concepts is essential.
Willingness to work in highly technical projects.
Exposure to Agile methodology with requirements-capturing using use cases and feature driven methods
Experience on identifying and executing test strategies, test plan and functional test cases, ability to work closely with Development team to create Behavior Driven Scenarios(BDD) is a plus.
Exposure the Defect tracking tools like JIRA is added advantage.
Experience in preparing and conducting functional reviews and training sessions.
Capability to works with clients and cross location teams to establish and maintain a consistent delivery.
Ability to work closely in a team environment is highly recommended.
Excellent presentation / communication skills with ability to co-ordinate between multiple stakeholders
 Missions
Understand user expectations (Explicit and Implicit requirements) and raises clarifications with stakeholders to prepare functional specifications.
Translate business knowledge / requirement to the development team on Functional Specifications.
Train developers on functional concepts and resolve functional problems faced.
Interact with the end users, understand business needs and assist to resolve operational pain points
Acts as SPOC for business requirements and represents the end user to the development team.
Conduct functional testing thereby responsible for certification of product release before user acceptance - take full ownership of the delivery of the product in terms of quality and meeting the client requirements.
Understand Agile practices (daily scrum, iteration planning, retrospective, test driven, behavior driven, model storming)and follow the same.
Set priority on work product as per the agreed iteration goals
Work effectively with other team members by sharing best practices.
Profile -Techno-Functional BA having 5-7 years of Investment Banking experience with working knowledge of SQL queries.
 ORGANIZATION WRITE - UP
The Multi-national Investment Bank is one of the leading European financial services groups. Based on a diversified and integrated banking model, the Group combines financial strength and proven expertise in innovation with a strategy of sustainable growth, aiming to be the trusted partner for its clients, committed to the positive transformations of society and the economy.
 Active in the real economy for over 150 years, with a solid position in Europe and connected to the rest of the world, The MNC Investment Company has over 147,000 members of staff* in 67 countries and supports on a daily basis 31 million individual clients, businesses and institutional investors(1) around the world by offering a wide range of advisory services and tailored financial solutions. The Group is built on three complementary core businesses: - French Retail Banking, which encompasses the MNC Bank Each offers a full range of financial services with omnichannel products at the cutting edge of digital innovation. - International Retail Banking, Insurance and Financial Services to Corporates, with networks in Africa, Russia, Central and Eastern Europe and specialised businesses that are leaders in their markets.
 Global Banking and Investor Solutions, which offers recognised expertise, key international locations and integrated solutions.The Global Investment Bank e is included in the principal socially responsible investment indices: DJSI (World and Europe), FTSE4Good (Global and Europe), Euronext Vigeo (World, Europe and Eurozone), four of the STOXX ESG Leaders indices, and the MSCI Low Carbon Leaders Index.
 In 2017, the Group put in place a more agile organisation based on 17 Business Units (business lines, regions) and 10 Service Units (support and control functions) to encourage innovation and synergies, and to better respond to the new requirements and behaviours of its clients.
To apply, send your updated resume to
OTHER SERVICES OF RAMSOL

html_job_description:
Job Description

Business Analyst Job Responsibilities:

Elicits, analyzes, specifies, and validates the business needs of stakeholders, be they customers or end users.
Collaborates with project sponsors to determine project scope and vision.
Clearly identifies project stakeholders and establish customer classes, as well as their characteristics.
Conducts interviews to gather customer requirements via workshops, questionnaires, surveys, site visits, workflow storyboards, use cases, scenarios, and other methods.
Identifies and establishes scope and parameters of requirements analysis on a project-by-project basis to define project impact, outcome criteria, and metrics.
Works with stakeholders and project team to prioritize collected requirements.
Researches, reviews, and analyzes the effectiveness and efficiency of existing requirements-gathering processes and develop strategies for enhancing or further leveraging these processes.
Assists in conducting research on products to meet agreed upon requirements and to support purchasing efforts.
Participates in the QA of purchased solutions to ensure features and functions have been enabled and optimized.
Participates in the selection of any requirements documentation software solutions that the organization may opt to use.
Analyzes and verifies requirements for completeness, consistency, comprehensibility, feasibility, and conformity to standards.

Job Description

Back ground
Business Analyst is the person who understands the business better. He is the person who plays the role of a bridge between the business team (customer) and the technical team (service provider). He also knows the optimal solution to the business problem and if needed he helps the client to select the best solutions out of the set of proposed solutions.
Additionally, he is the single point of contact for the technical team. In case of any query that they might face, they reach none other than the Business Analyst.
He is the person who gathers the requirement and solely responsible for the same. This is not as easy as to listen. If he misses something while gathering requirement, it can create a blunder especially in complex applications.
Also, he is the person who prepares questionnaire and conduct interview of different SMEs (Subject Matter Experts) involved.
Career to BA :
In order to become a Business Analyst, it is not necessary that you start your career as a BA. However, if you get a BA profile post your graduation then the goal is met. If not, then your aim should be getting a job in the IT Industry first. Once you start working you should try to get involved in any projects or change activities that are going on within your organisation. This could include helping with testing, contributing ideas to workshops or even designing/writing procedure manuals. This may mean that you get to work with business analysts, or understand more the work that they do (In essence, work as a Shadow Resource). It will also provide you with examples you can relate to when it comes to applying for a BA position.
Additionally, if possible, start exploring different domains like Investment Banking, Retail Banking, Payments, Telecom, Aviation, Energy etc.
Cheers!
Mandatory Skills
Excellent communication skills—client facing role
Strong knowledge on Electronics
Knowledge on Telecom industry
 C2D Solutions Private Limited is a Fast growing Software IT Company.

Job Description

  • Evaluating business processes, anticipating requirements, uncovering areas for improvement, and developing and implementing solutions.
  • Leading ongoing reviews of business processes and developing optimization strategies.
  • Staying up-to-date on the latest process and IT advancements to automate and modernize systems.
  • Conducting meetings and presentations to share ideas and findings.
  • Performing requirements analysis.
  • Documenting and communicating the results of your efforts.
  • Effectively communicating your insights and plans to cross-functional team members and management.
  • Gathering critical information from meetings with various stakeholders and producing useful reports.
  • Working closely with clients, technicians, and managerial staff.
  • Providing leadership, training, coaching, and guidance to junior staff.
  • Allocating resources and maintaining cost efficiency.
  • Ensuring solutions meet business needs and requirements.
  • Performing user acceptance testing.
  • Managing projects, developing project plans, and monitoring performance.
  • Updating, implementing and maintaining procedures.
  • Prioritizing initiatives based on business needs and requirements.
  • Serving as a liaison between stakeholders and users.
  • Managing competing resources and priorities.
  • Monitoring deliverables and ensuring timely completion of projects.

job_description: If you desire to be part of something special, to be part of a winning team, to be part of a fun team – winning is fun.We are looking forward to a Business Analyst - BI - APAC Region in Eaton’s Sales and Marketing Center, basedin Pune, India.In Eaton, making our work exciting, engaging, and meaningful; ensuring safety, health, wellness; and being a model of inclusion & diversity are already embedded in who we are - it’s in our values, part of our vision, and our clearly defined aspirational goals. This is an individual contributor role working for Eaton Vehicles organization. The primary function of a Business Analyst - BI is to work closely with the business for understanding reporting needs, establishing/documenting requirements and creating reports and dashboards in BI Tools as per the requirement. This position also requires collaborating with various business teams to get the required data, facts to meet the business report requirements. Taking end to end ownership of the report/dashboards, ensuring data quality, driving cadence, defining KPI’s with business for marketing evaluation is also part of this role. The position requires SDLC understanding starting with requirement gathering and analysis for solution proposal, BI reports creation, Change management, Training and Testing, Data Auditing, maintenance and support. The position requires excellent business acumen, understanding of sales processes along with excellent communication skills. This exciting role offers opportunity to: Working closely with business for getting reporting needs and gathering requirements Documentation of requirements and signoff Designing and Creation of the reports in OBIEE/BI tool Connecting with business for data accuracy Testing the reports and dashboards Training the users on dashboards/reports Change management - Document, track, and communicate change with different stakeholders Stakeholder management, excellent communication and collaboration skills Understanding of Database concepts and SQL Strong knowledge of Advanced Excel Well versed with MS-Office suite Experience in any of the Reporting/BI tool (OBIEE, OBDD, Power-BI, MS-Excel) Drive project/meetings with stakeholders. Qualifications Minimum 3-5 years of relevant experience in BI tool. Excellent communication skills Understanding of BI Architecture. Understanding of defining and tracking Key Performance Indices (KPI). Thorough understanding of business processes & systems. Reasoning ability. Ability to develop relationships and communicate cross-functionally. Must be able to solve problem independently and make decisions. Basic Knowledge Business Applications, and Software testing methodology. Knowledge of requirement gathering techniques. Yes! Because you are the one we are looking for, we hope to hear from you now! We make what matters work. Everywhere you look—from the technology and machinery that surrounds us, to the critical services and infrastructure that we depend on every day—you’ll find one thing in common. It all relies on power. That’s why Eaton is dedicated to improving people’s lives and the environment with power management technologies that are more reliable, efficient, safe and sustainable. Because this is what matters. We are confident we can deliver on this promise because of the attributes that our employees embody. We’re ethical, passionate, accountable, efficient, transparent and we’re committed to learning. These values enable us to tackle some of the toughest challenges on the planet, never losing sight of what matters. Job: Marketing Region: Asia Pacific Organization: Corporate Sector Job Level: Individual Contributor Schedule: Full-time Is remote work (i.e. working from home or another Eaton facility) allowed for this position?: No Does this position offer relocation?: No Travel: Yes, 10 % of the Time

Job Description

 McKinley and Rice Inc. is a software development company with highly experienced leadership, believing in the overall growth of every individual along with the company.
We are looking for a TBA who will take a key role on our team to provide expert business technology guidance. Our TBA will be responsible for the technical vision and development of our full software development life cycle, from conceptualization to deployment. You will be managing other engineers and developers, collaborating on the various layers of the infrastructure for our platform/application/etc. Prepare and present reports to the C-Suite.
 Job Responsibilities:-
 Technical vision  : The TBA must work with the CEO and COO to develop a professional strategy for the company. This would involve goal-setting, discussing methodologies, and analyzing risks. Your technical strategy must align with the company's overall business objectives, so the TBA will need both technical skills and good business sense to fulfill this responsibility.
 Software Development:  Working with software developers and leads, the TBA coordinate with IT community to develop functional requirements, technical specifications and high level designs. Provide system configuration and application upgrade support.Prepare test cases, business use cases and participate in the testing process to evaluate the technology solutions The TBA maximizes the efficiency of production efforts by coordinating between the various teams and operations involved in the process and ensuring there is no overlap.
 Business development  : The TBA has the responsibility to communicate with business users in order to interpret requirements for IT groups. Manage all types of business technology projects, monitor applications and provide analytical solutions to resolve technical issues.The TBA keeps an eye out for new technological developments that can help the company improve efficiency and customer satisfaction.
 End-user responsibility:  He or she builds confidence in the company's vision, participates in customer meetings, and works diligently to meet end-user needs.
 Desired Expertise
 Personal characteristics. :
 Should have excellent communication skills.
 Flexible and willing to accept a change in priorities as necessary
 Ability to work independently and multi-task effectively
 Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
 Good documentation and writing skills
 Specific skills. :
 Experience as a Full-stack developer preferable (front-end/back-end)
 Exposure to Node.JS, Python, JAVA, Android/iOS, React, React-Native, Docker, Big Data, ML/ DL, Blockchain, etc. (Preferred)
 Must know programming languages to be discussed in the interview.
 Skilled use of Microsoft Office presentation, analysis and reporting tools, particularly Project, PowerPoint, Word and Excel
 Must have strong technical skills and hands-on experience in product implementations.
 Ability to work under strict timelines, negotiate and reach consensus
 Required Skills and Qualifications
 :-
 Proven experience as a TBA or a similar leadership role
 Knowledge of technological trends to build a strategy
 Good understand of synchronous, asynchronous business workflow and processing.
 Understanding of budgets and business-planning
 Ability to conduct technical analyses and research
 Leadership and organizational abilities
 Strategic thinking
 Problem-solving aptitude
 Master's degree in Computer Science or related field.
 Must be an MBA (Preferred).
 3+ years working in a technological role.
 3+ years of managerial experience.
 What We Offer:-
 Attractive salary and perks
 Stimulating work environment
 Excellent long term career growth opportunities

html_job_description:
In this role, you have the opportunity to

As a procurement business analyst, you will be responsible for identifying and implementing changes to existing procurement function at Philips procurement engineering domain.
 
KEY AREAS OF RESPONSIBILITIES
 
·       Uses a wide range of tools for process analysis, related to identifying new savings opportunities in business
·       Problem solvers, who are flexible and creative in finding solutions
·       Collaborates with users cross-functionally to identify innovative methods of leveraging technology to improve efficiency, quality and speed in Procurement function
·       Partnering with designated Business Process Leads to analyze current state business processes, identify pain-points, and developing recommendations for process/system improvement
·       Familiarity with the concept of relational databases and reporting (data warehousing and business intelligence tools).
 
You are a part of

Procurement engineering team is responsible for set-up of procurement processes in Idea to Market, Market to order and Order to customer. Procurement as a function KPI’s include BOM savings, procurement strategy for new products, productivity ideas and drive these with different stakeholders supports all NPI’s, new cost savings ideas and new procurement processes.

To succeed in this role, you should have the following skills and experience

·       07-12 years of relevant procurement analyst experience
·       Maintenance and analyze , global reports and summaries of master data status
·       MS Excel, Macros, visual basics, share point creation, management
·       Creating Dashboards, MS Project knowledge, analytics tools: Excel, SQL, Tableau, Python, and Visio.
·       Experience working with large data sets.
·       Experience in working multiple systems like SAP, Windchill, ARIBA or similar systems
·       Should be a quick learner and adoptive to changes. He/she will be our global process and systems leader
·       Change Leader / should be able to work with multiple geographies, cultures and team levels
·       Bachelors in quantitative field (Math, Finance, Statistics Business, Economics)

In return, we offer you
A rewarding career in Philips with attractive package.Extensive set of tools to drive your career, such as a personal development budget, free training and coachingAttractive collective health insurance packageOpportunity to buy Philips shares and products with discount

Why should you join Philips?

Working at Philips is more than a job. It’s a calling to create a healthier society through meaningful work, focused on improving 3 billion lives a year by delivering innovative solutions across the health continuum. Our people experience a variety of unexpected moments when their lives and careers come together in meaningful ways. Learn more by watching this video.

To find out more about what it’s like working for Philips at a personal level, visit the Working at Philips page on our career website, where you can read stories from our employee blog. Once there,you can also learn about our recruitment process, or find answers to some of the frequently asked questions.

html_job_description:
This is an exciting opportunity for an Engineering or a Computer Science graduate with significant work experience and possibly an MBA, wishing to move into the business analysis and management of Investment Banking projects and get some international exposure.

Role Project Manager / Business Analyst role will provide exposure to a range of projects including the development of graphical user interfaces, simulations, interface between different systems, derivatives pricing models and standalone applications. There will be interaction with clients developers, business analysts and project managers as well as our companys financial engineers/ consultants, for the definition of specifications, and product delivery.

Ideal candidates must have completed an Engineering or a Computer Science degree in a top- tier university, and be motivated to move to the financial software industry and enhance their knowledge in the field of financial derivatives. An MBA, or other postgraduate qualification will be an advantage. 3 to 6 years of commercial experience in C++/ C# projects (development, business analysis and project management), preferably but not necessarily in the financial sector, are required. High level of analytical and organization skills is critical, as well as strong customer services skills and proficiency in English. Additionally, knowledge of MS Project/ Vision (or similar software), UML and good understanding of databases will be considered as an advantage.

Tech / M.E in Computer Science / IT. [Minimum 55% marks in aggregate].<br /> <br>Experience: Minimum 2 year experience as Business Analyst preferably in banking project.<br /> <br>Job Profile: <br /> <br>a) Requirement Gathering, Design, Development, Testing (QA/UAT), production, Readiness, post-production monitoring.<br /> <br>b) Strong job experience with quality assurance and quality control phases of the software testing lifecycle (STLC).<br /> <br>c) Building programming logic and are able to do analysis, design, develop, test. Debug, implement and maintain various client –server technology based software and web based software (as per Bank requirements) under UNIX / Window platforms by strictly following SDLC.<br /> <br>d) Good working experience in the above said technologies in information technology companies / banks & financial institutions.<br /> <br>e) Experience with QA and test management tools (i.e Jira, Test Link etc.) for test case development, test execution and defect management.<br /> <br>f) Basic programming knowledge a plus.<br /> <br>g) Experience working in a Traditional (Waterfall) or Agile (Scrum) environment.<br /> <br>h) Ability to own project assignments and meet deadlines and work independently as well as in a group setting.<br /> <br>i) Critical thinking and problem solving skills.<br /> <br>j) Flexibility in leaning new products and technologies quickly as well as the versatility to move across platforms and / or applications as needed.<br /> <br>The appointment of officers is on all India basis and selected candidates liable to be posted at Head Office of the Bank or anywhere in India as per Bank’s requirement.<br /> <br>How to apply:-<br /> <br>Before applying online, candidates should:<br /> <br>(i) Scan their photograph and signature ensuring that both the photograph and signature adhere to the required specifications as given under Guideline for photograph & signature scan and upload.<br /> <br>(ii) Have a valid personal e-mail address and mobile number which should be kept active till the completion of this Recruitment Process. Bank may send call letters for the examination etc. through the registered e-mail ID. In case a candidate does not have a valid personal e-mail ID, he/she should create his/her new e-mail ID and mobile no. before applying on-line and must maintain that e-mail account and mobile number.<br /> <br>Candidates are advised to go to the Bank’s website www.bankofmaharashtra.in and click on the ‘Recruitment’ to open the link “Online application for recruitment of “Specialist Officers (IT Department) In Scale II” and then click on the option “Apply Online” which will open a new screen.<br /> <br>Important Dates:-<br /> <br>Commencement date for online application: 16-12-2019<br /> <br>Last Date for online application: 31-12-2019<br /> <br>Date of Written Examination (If decided by the Bank): Will be informed separately.<br /> <br>Date of GD / Interview: Will be informed separately.<br /> <br>For more details: https://www.bankofmaharashtra.in/writereaddata/documentlibrary/d139f5e0-5690-4b97-872a-b283a645fc40.pdf</p> <p><b>Perks and Benefits </b></p>31705-1145/1-32850-1310/10-45950 (Subject to revision).

The position requires a person who entails entrepreneurial skillsets & is eager to work in similar setup. <BR> <BR> Responsibilities include: <BR> <BR> - Establish strong relationships with various internal and external customers / teams [all inside the Organisation] to gain an understanding of their strategies, objectives, and tactics to develop a comprehensive analytics strategy. <BR> <BR> - Engages various customers to understand their requirements, translate them into initial analytics projects, scope them out and work with the off-shore team to get them build and executed as per the customer requirements. <BR> <BR> - Project & customer management. <BR> <BR> - Assess specific operational issues / areas (such as what work gets done in what regions, cost benefit analysis, establishing best practices, creating models for business problems, etc) for improvement and develop an approach / design for addressing the same through detailed analysis and / or interaction with key departments / functions leaders. <BR> <BR> - Takes overall responsibility for the project, including thought leadership role in problem solving and developing recommendations and executing them for a global organization. <BR> <BR> - Can play an individual delivery role in executing complex, large analytical and problem solving modules in vast areas. <BR> <BR> - Synthesizes team's work to create deliverables, including reports, spreadsheets, presentations and other outputs to document and communicate findings to customers. <BR> <BR> - Collaborates with and presents business recommendations to various stakeholders. <BR> <BR> </P> <p><b>Required Candidate profile</b></p>Qualifications: <BR><BR>- Degree in a Computer Science and/or Engineering related discipline; job_description: Medline is continuing to expand our operations in Pune and is looking for a Business Analyst Associate who is capable of performing data analysis and reporting. The goal of this job is to ensure accuracy of the data analysis and ensure timely reports in proper manner. <br> <br> <b> Some of the roles and responsibilities</b> <br> <br> <ul> <li> 	Validate, Maintain, and Cleanse item and vendor master files; including item attributes, vendor, compliance, and country of origin changes.  </li> <li> 	Create and manage supporting data and data structures to ensure master data information is accurately returned. </li> <li> 	Manage exception reporting and consolidate, validate and cleanse data in order to produce more accurate results. Support Sourcing and Data Management mail boxes.</li> <li> 	Identify data and create a report necessary to perform business. </li> <li> 	Identify and implement process improvement opportunities.</li> <li> 	Work directly with internal teams (such as Sales, Inventory Management, Marketing) to provide intermediate level analysis and reporting as necessary. </li> <li> 	Monitor for data accuracy, timeliness and integrity in data used in analysis and reporting. Communicate to appropriate personnel if data inaccuracies exist.</li> <li> 	Ensure follow-up so that analysis and reporting outcomes are reviewed and implemented.</li> <li> 	Must manipulate large amounts of data in Excel efficiently and accurately.</li> <li> 	Act as point person for all Edit Reports (logic-based analysis reports). Understand purpose of each report. Be able to work each report. Analyze/Modify/Write reports. Standardize, streamline, and automate reports.</li> </ul> <b> Required Skills</b>  <br> <br> <ul> <li> 	2-4 years of previous experience working in analytical role.</li> <li> 	Excellent proficiency in Microsoft Excel is must.</li> <li> 	Strong verbal and written communication in English</li> <li> 	Solid problem solver </li> </ul>      o	Positive attitudes towards problems and likes challenges<br>      o	Strong analytical capabilities with attention to details, thoughtful in considering          all aspects of the problem and potential solutions<br>      o	Intellectually curious  eager to learn, quick learner and like to ask questions <br> <ul> <li> 	Very organized in both file and data management</li> <li> 	Strong drive for results with and strong work ethics</li> <li> 	Ability to work independently and proactively</li> <li> 	SAP & AS400 experience will be added advantage</li> <li> 	Interpersonal skills  collaborate with diverse multicultural teams.</li> <li> Planning and project management skills  through careful prioritization, manage multiple projects to deliver within agreed timeframes.</li> </ul> <br> <b>  Educational Qualification </b> <br> <br> <ul> <li> 	Any Graduate / Post Graduate degree </li> <li> 	Knowledge of SAP & AS400 will be added advantage</li> <li> 	Ability to extract, analyze and report on data required & previous experience working with databases strongly preferred.</li> </ul> <b>  Work Experience:</b> <br> <br> <ul> <li>   2-4 years of relevant experience</li> </ul>

<p> <b> Role and responsibilities</b> </p> <b>   </b> <p> As a Business Analyst, you would:</p>   <ul> <li>  Work closely with clients to understand their business processes and needs, and create clear, concise and complete business/functional requirements.</li> <li>  Plan, organize and facilitate requirements meetings and workshops.</li> <li>  Play the Product Owner role within the project team and manage the product backlog and prioritization</li> <li>  Closely work with the project and client teams throughout the project life-cycle to clarify business and technical requirements</li> <li>  Partner with development and testing teams to establish appropriate requirements traceability for assigned projects.</li> <li>  Support testing teams (development, QA, UAT, etc.) during the creation and execution of test plans and test cases for assigned projects.</li> <li>  Assist client users with user training and documentation as needed.</li> </ul> <p> <br> </p> <p> <b> Preferred Skills</b> </p> <b>   </b> <ul> <li> <b>  </b> Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects</li> <li>  Experience in Agile Project life-cycle planning and management methodologies and tools</li> <li>  Strong oral and written communication skills and interpersonal skills</li> <li>  Excellent analytical, quantitative, and problem solving skills</li> <li>  Ability to analyze information from multiple data sources and present it concisely</li> <li>  Superb attention to detail</li> <li>  Good to have: Experience in Pre-Sales process/ creating proposals</li> </ul> <p> <br> </p> <p> <b> Experience and Education Requirements</b> </p> <b>   </b> <ul> <li> <b>  </b> MBA from a premier institute with 4 - 6 years of experience as a Business Analyst</li> <li> or</li> <li>  Bachelor's degree from a premier institute with 5 - 8 years of experience as a Business Analyst.</li> </ul>

job_description:
Experience: 2 - 3 years
Keywords / Skills : Artificial Intelligence, NLP, Machine Learning, Deep Learning

Job Description

 Data Analyst - Machine Learning
Skills and Qualifications
●	Excellent understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms, such as k-NN, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests, Neural Networks, etc.
●	Experience with common data science toolkits, such as NumPy, sklearn, TensorFlow, Pandas, Matplotlib, Pickle, Keras, etc is highly desirable.
●	Perform statistical analysis, data mining, temporal and pattern analysis, correlation of events, predictive modeling, and pattern recognition for various use cases.
●	Good applied statistics skills, such as distributions, statistical testing, regression, etc.
●	Should have a thorough knowledge of statistics and probability (knowledge of calculus and linear algebra would be a plus).
●	Experience with data visualization tools, such as D3.js, GGplot, etc.
●	Proficiency in using query languages such as SQL
●	Good scripting and programming skills using Python.
●	Ability to adapt and learn quickly
●	Provide informational briefings to explain methodologies and analytical findings to peers and customer stakeholders.
●	Investigate and implement new scientific analysis and methodologies to support big data analytics efforts.
●	Experience with one or more of the following frameworks: Pytorch, Caffe, TensorFlow, and Theano is a plus.
 At Raising Global Solutions we are inspired by our Vision and Mission. They constantly drive us to manage our relationships with various stakeholders.
 RGS Placements Vision is to help its clients to source man power, achieve strategic advantage and operational effectiveness in their business. This is achieved by bringing the best practices in consulting resources with the pool of experienced Human Resource Managers who understand the business needs of the customer.
 Raising Global Solutions Placements Mission is to provide excellent platform to both jobseekers and the employers. We believe firmly that there is no alternative of quality services and client could only feel happy if we can provide them the best value for their money.
 RGS Placements is one of the fastest growing placements consultants of India. RGS Placements has been providing Man power to several companies. We are recognized as Best Consultant from our Clients.
 With a major focus on hiring of ‘Experienced Profiles’, RGS has helped over a hundreds of Experienced professionals employed and desirous of relocating to Other Places in India, find opportunities matching their aptitude and aspirations.
 We take the time to listen, understand and match specific position prerequisites and company cultural compatibilities before suggesting a candidate. We believe the power of association is an important part of inclusive and organic growth.
 We build client relationships which are cemented with trust and they strengthen with every assignment.
 RGS provides a varied range of services for both clients as well as candidates.
 RGS roots in management consulting enable us to bring a unique approach to recruitment. Our focus has always been on entry, middle and senior management talent needs. We recruit across various industry segments for multinational corporations as well as leading Indian business houses.
 RGS today is recognized as a corporate body with strong values and ethics, a skilled, competent and dedicated work force aided by appropriate technology… an ideal blend to explore and build National & International markets…
 RGS strives to deliver services and value to our customers with the same enthusiasm, passion and pride since its founding year, 2011

job_description: <P> <P> We are looking for Data Scientist for top & starts up e-commerce and internet companies. <BR> <BR> Please find the Job description Below ; <BR> <BR> Required ; <BR> <BR> - B.Tech/ M.Tech/ PhD from a reputed institution. Masters/ PhD is preferred <BR> <BR> - 3-8 years of relevant experience applying machine learning, statistics, text mining, social network analysis, information retrieval, information extraction, AI, deep learning, etc <BR> <BR> - Strong depth and breadth of knowledge in different areas of data mining as well as reasonable programming and design skills to manipulate Big Data and build prototypes that work on massive datasets <BR> <BR> - Work experience in an Internet company preferred <BR> <BR> - Strong programming experience in at least one of the programming languages such as - Python, C/C++, Java, Scala <BR> <BR> - Experience in using tools such as Scikit-Learn, Spark MLlib, R, Weka, GATE, Cluto, Solr. / Lucene, ML-Pack, Vowpal Wabbit, LibSVM, Mallet etc <BR> <BR> - Peer-reviewed publications at top international conferences/ journals in fields related to data mining, knowledge discovery and machine learning is a plus <BR> <BR> - Experience in handling big data technologies such as Hadoop/ MapReduce, Spark, HBase, Cassandra, Storm, Hive, Pig, etc. is a plus <BR> <BR> - Exceptional problem-solving skills and strong business/ product thinking <BR> <BR> Roles & Responsibilities: <BR> <BR> - You create intelligent and highly relevant experiences in our products that wow our users <BR> <BR> - You analyse peta-scale data to train ML models and evaluate them with the right metrics <BR> <BR> - You work with engineers to create ML pipelines that process and mine massive scale data <BR> <BR> - You partner with product managers to make data-driven decisions and help solve the right problems for our users.</P>

job_description: <p> Assistant Vice President - Machine Learning - US Credit Cards Portfolio </p> <p> Role Requirement : <br> <br> - The candidate is expected to lead a team of 10-15 analysts working on portfolio risk reporting and analytics in Customer Management and Authorizations work functions for US Credit Cards portfolio of a Top Global Bank <br> <br> - 7+ years of experience in Machine Learning is must <br> <br> - Candidate is expected to bring in a consultative mindset and problem-solving approach and drive analytical throughput for the team <br> <br> - Experience in Credit card/ banking domain with knowledge across customer lifecycle is must <br> <br> - Candidate should have excellent communication skills to interact with senior clients <br> <br> - Candidate should have excellent people management skills and must have team lead experience of 10+ size team for at least 2 years in similar domain <br> <br> - Candidate should be open to travel to client locations (US) as required for short-term visits <br> <br> Expected education / Tool Experience : <br> <br> - Experience using SAS to analyze and solve business problems <br> <br> - Demonstrated ability to synthesize, prioritize and drive results with a high sense of urgency <br> <br> - Strong sense of accountability and decisiveness in a strong work ethic culture <br> <br> - Experience working in a team of analysts with a common goal and will have a strong understanding of the cards business dynamics that will drive the analyses</p>

<P> <P> Job Description :</P> <P> <BR> </P> <P> As an Intelligent Automation Technical delivery leader, you will be responsible to provide people and technical leadership, oversight and mentorship for automation, Machine Learning (ML), Artificial Intelligence (AI) and cognitive end-to-end processes while maintaining and leading communication with global business teams, and senior leaders. <BR> <BR> Responsibilities can include : <BR> <BR> - Lead global technical teams to deliver production strength Intelligent Automation, Machine Learning and artificial intelligence use cases <BR> <BR> - Deliver products using Machine Learning and strong statistical knowledge, while applying machine learning models to real data <BR> <BR> - Lead and maintain customer relationships while working with business relationship managers and sectors leads to accomplishing goals <BR> <BR> - Lead the preparation and presentation of materials to senior leadership <BR> <BR> - Work within fast-paced agile development methodology (i.e. SAFe Agile) to accomplish our goals with entrepreneurial spirit <BR> <BR> Desired Experience : <BR> <BR> - Minimum 10+ years of hands-on development experience with a deep understanding of programming concepts <BR> <BR> - 5+ years of hands-on quantitative analytics experience, statistical modelling, machine learning, forecasting, optimization and/or predictive analytics. <BR> <BR> - Expertise in a variety of Deep Learning architectures including Residual Networks, RNN/CNN, Transformer, and Transfer Learning <BR> <BR> - Proficient with programming languages such as Java, Python R, VB, C#, or .NET </P>

job_description: <P> <P> <BR> Job Responsibilities : <BR> <BR> - Use of cutting edge data mining, machine learning techniques for building advanced recommender systems, knowledge management, and insight generation. <BR> <BR> - Understand business challenges and goals to formulate the approach for data analysis and model creation that will support business decision making <BR> <BR> - Take analytical objectives and define data requirements in terms of size, format, and cleansing needs for purposes of analysis, modeling/segmentation and reporting <BR> <BR> - Research on innovative technologies to come up with novel data mining, modeling/segmentation approaches required to solve unique and complex business problems <BR> <BR> - Interpret, document and present/communicate analytical results to multiple business disciplines, providing conclusions and recommendations based on customer-centric data. <BR> <BR> - Building intelligent systems leveraging the vast amount of available user/behavior data to enrich the end-user experience <BR> <BR> </P> <p><b>Required Candidate profile</b></p>Job Requirements <BR><BR>- Masters- (with 4+ years of experience) Or Ph.D. (with 0 - 2 years of experience) in a relevant field such as Probability, Statistics, Machine Learning, Data Mining, Artificial intelligence/Computer Science <BR><BR>- Experience with building data analytics models via supervised and unsupervised machine learning, statistical analysis, and predictive modeling techniques. <BR><BR>- Understanding of statistical modeling/machine learning/ data mining concepts and strong analytical and quantitative problem-solving ability <BR><BR>- Strong background and experience in using R, SAS, MATLAB or equivalent statistical/data analysis tools and technologies is a must. <BR><BR>- Hands-on skills in using techniques such as Parametric and Non-Parametric Regression models, <BR><BR>Skills : PYTHON, ANALYSIS

<P> <P> Some of the areas that the Data Science team would be involved in : <BR> <BR> - Recommendations to suggest shows, news and allied content across 100 million TV Viewers. <BR> <BR> - Build competitive real time Ad-fraud detection systems for the digital-ad ecosystem. <BR> <BR> - Building competitive bidding systems to identify robust and efficient ad-campaign utilisation. <BR> <BR> - Build custom demographic characteristics based on media consumption habits and behaviour embeddings <BR> <BR> - Multi-level Forecasting algorithms: How many people are likely to watch the IPL game next week, next hour? Which<BR> of these users fit a defined psychographic profile? <BR> <BR> - Building Automated Anomaly Detection Solutions across businesses. <BR> <BR> - Deep Learning Products on Video and Image Processing. <BR> <BR> Roles : <BR> <BR> Requirements : <BR> <BR> - The candidate is expected to own Data and ML pipeline for projects across the different business units in Zapr and should have good experience implementing and handling end to end data science products (~10's TB of Datasets). </P> <P> <BR> </P> <P> - He is also expected to own periodic model validation and optimization workflows for the data science products developed. <BR> <BR> - Should have worked on large scale data heavy projects on user profiling, time series, forecasting models, segmentation, cluster models, campaign optimization, pattern mining / detection, classification/regression modeling, recommender systems and deep learning models etc. <BR> <BR> Hands on : Organize and wrangle large datasets. <BR> <BR> - Good understanding of model validation processes and optimizations. <BR> <BR> - Good applied statistics skills, such as distributions, statistical testing, regression, etc. <BR> <BR> - Strong hands on scripting and programming experience in Python <BR> <BR> - Great analytical skills and excellent hands on experience in Machine Learning techniques such as Decision Trees (Random Forest), SVM, GBMs, Topic modelling, Regression (Linear & Logistic) and Deep Learning algorithms like CNN, RNN and LSTMs. <BR> <BR> - Ability and willingness to go through research papers and implement ideas/algorithms for product/platform development. <BR> <BR> - Fluency using different machine learning techniques and algorithms, ideally using ML, Deep Learning frameworks & Statistical libraries such as Scikit-learn, Tensorflow, Keras, Pytorch etc. <BR> <BR> - Work with engineers to translate models into scalable high-performance engineering systems <BR> <BR> - Actively involve in envisioning and design discussions of new AI based assets/platforms with product stakeholders <BR> <BR> - Exposure to Big Data technologies Hadoop, Hive, MapReduce, SparkML <BR> <BR> Requirements : <BR> <BR> Top Characteristics we look for. <BR> <BR> - Great ML, DL and statistical implementations complementing Problem Solving Ability. <BR> <BR> - Awesome SQL, data scripting and wrangling skills <BR> <BR> - Fast paced, detail-oriented and ability to own the Data Science product pipelines. </P> <p><b>Required Candidate profile</b></p>Background : <BR><BR>- Degree in a relevant study area is required (e.g. computer science, mathematics, operations research, statistics, business analytics, engineering ) <BR><BR>- 6 to 12 years of experience in the field of advanced quantitative techniques, data sciences and large scale machine learning while working for leading global academic institutes or corporate innovation research labs or analytics organizations of large corporates or in consulting companies in analytics roles.

job_description: The Qualcomm CR&D team is developing hardware and software solutions for the Qualcomm ADAS system. We are seeking ambitious, bright and innovative engineers with experience in software system design, autonomy, device functional safety concepts and implementations. Job activities span the whole product life cycle from early R&D to commercial deployment. The environment is fast-paced and requires cross-functional interaction on a daily basis so good communication, planning and execution skills are a must. Qualcomm is a company of inventors that unlocked 5G - ushering in an age of rapid acceleration in connectivity and new possibilities that will transform industries, create jobs, and enrich lives. But this is just the beginning. It takes inventive minds with diverse skills, backgrounds, and cultures to transform 5Gs potential into world-changing technologies and products. This is the Invention Age - and this is where you come in. Qualcomm is utilizing its traditional strengths in digital wireless technologies to play a central role in the evolution of automotive infotainment and autonomous driving. We are investing in several supporting technologies including 4G, 5G, ADAS, and Deep Learning. The Qualcomm CR&D team is developing hardware and software solutions for the Qualcomm ADAS system. We are seeking ambitious, bright and innovative engineers with experience in software system design, autonomy, device functional safety concepts and implementations. production environment. </span>  </li>  <li>  <span style="font-size: 10pt;"> Work closely with business owners and operations teams to optimize and fine-tune various business operations using
